src:
Trump says trade deal with China coming along well

02 Nov 2019, 00:37

WASHINGTON (Reuters) - President Donald Trump said on Friday that talks on a trade agreement with China were coming along well, echoing comments by U.S. and Chinese officials of progress on an initial deal.
Reporting by Makini Brice; Writing by Eric Beech; Editing by Mohammad Zargham

Trump says trade deal with China coming along well

02 Nov 2019, 00:37

WASHINGTON (Reuters) - President Donald Trump said on Friday that talks on a trade agreement with China were coming along well, echoing comments by U.S. and Chinese officials of progress on an initial deal.
Reporting by Makini Brice; Writing by Eric Beech; Editing by Mohammad Zargham
